title: Third Floor 1bd Condo in Secured Building @ 1060 S. 3rd St #335
posting_body: Modern Third Floor 1bd Condo in Secured Building
Please review our Rental Qualifications & Video Tour BEFORE calling to request a viewing appointment:

**RENTAL QUALIFICATIONS: Please scroll to the bottom of the Marketing Description for a summary of the Rental Qualifications, and for the full Rental Qualifications and to print an Application, you can copy/paste this link into your search browser: <URL>
Available within one week of lease offer.
Rent is $2,300, with Water and Garbage included.
Small pets under 25 pounds are negotiable, and there will be $50/month for pet rent, per pet, as well as a $300 pet deposit, per pet.
Modern 1bd, 1ba condo, with approximately 667 sqft, located inside secured The Brickyard building.

Great community features include a pool, hot tub, BBQ area, community room, conference room, gym, library, pool table, secured entry & elevators for some floors, underground parking for one vehicle, open guest parking, limited street parking, and storage space.
This end unit is located on the third floor, with no upstairs neighbors; the elevator only goes to the second floor, with stairs going to the third floor.
High ceilings, overhead lighting, and central heating and air conditioning throughout.
Kitchen has granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and linoleum flooring.
Kitchen appliances include dishwasher, electric cook-top range, overhead microwave, garbage disposal, and fridge.
Open layout between the kitchen and living room-dining room combo.
Living room has track lighting, ceiling fan, large windows, and carpet.
Stacking washer and dryer in the hallway.
Bedroom has large windows, lighted ceiling fan, and carpet.
Large bathroom can be access from the hallway or bedroom, and includes a large closet, tile floors, granite counters, and shower-tub combo.
Personal storage closet outside the front door.
Great commuters location in Downtown San Jose; off Keyes and S. Third; quick freeway access to 280/680, 101, and 87.
Lots of dining, shopping, and transportation nearby.
1060 S. 3rd St #335, San Jose, CA 95112 (secured building).
Please take a drive by the property and if you'd like an interior tour, contact Valley Management Group at
A member of our staff will be happy to assist you.
*Applications will not be considered complete unless ALL documents & fees are turned in for ALL applicants.
*All persons 18 years of age and older, must submit a Valley Management Group application and will be subject to credit and reference screening.
*The $30 screening fee per application is non-refundable once processed.
*Applicants must be at their current place of employment for at least 6 months, three of your most recent paycheck stubs must be submitted with your application.
If you do not have three of your most recent paycheck stubs, submit what you do have plus banks statements for the last three months to prove sufficient funds.
Applicants who are self-employed or unemployed must provide banks statements for the last three months to prove sufficient funds.
The bank account must be in the applicant’s name.
Self-employed applicants must also provide previous year’s income tax return.
*New hires must provide an offer letter from their employer on company letterhead verifying income and employment plus banks statements for the last three months to prove sufficient funds.
*Government issued identification must be presented at time application is submitted.
Monthly household income must be legal, verifiable and be paid directly to applicant(s).
Income must equal at least two (2) times the monthly rent.
Security deposit on the unit is equal to one (1) month’s current rent on the unit and must be paid in its entirety within 24 hours after acceptance.
In addition, a pro-rated 1st months’ rent will be due on the day of move in.
Each applicant must have positive rental references from prior landlords, (references from family members or friends will not be considered).
Negative rental history will result in denial.
Applicant must have no prior eviction record, or request from prior landlord to vacate premises for breach of contract.
*CREDIT REQUIREMENTS: All persons 18 and older must fill out an application and be screened for credit acceptance.
Acceptance is with the following guidelines.
No more than (2) 30 day or (1) 60 day late payment within the last 24 months.
All accounts must show positive, current and paid as agreed.
No collection accounts, bankruptcies or charge-offs within the last 24 months.
At least two (2) open trade accounts in good standing, and paid as agreed, for three (3) months running within the last year.
